data.description:
Updated with every user suggestion at least twice a week for multiple months in a row, Top Features are:

**3D Coverage Everywhere**

â€¢Almost every identifiable city on earth is in realistic 3D, even my tiny town in a poor side of Romania is covered, so you are probably able to visit your own street in 3D

**ChatGPT Integration: The new AI companion can**

â€¢Help with user interface

â€¢Hear, See and Talk in any language

â€¢Offer information about surroundings

â€¢Teleport you anywhere on earth

â€¢Remember past conversations

**Realistic Lighting Mode**

â€¢Realistic Real-time Lighting and Day/Night Cycle with no Performance Impact

**Street View**

â€¢With every street on earth and every panorama taken by people

**Terrain Quality**

â€¢Same as Google Earth on PC by default, EarthQuest can go much further and achieve absolute photorealistic terrain by pushing the terrain quality to insane detail and range with the best performance possible

**Google Maps on the Hand Menu**

â€¢Intelligent or manual zoom based on altitude

â€¢No setup needed, the map comes with free unlimited usage

â€¢Every street and landmark on Earth is covered

â€¢Paired with the compass feature, Orientation is seen on map

**Consistent Hand Tracking**

â€¢Rotate by Grabbing an Imaginary Steering Wheel

â€¢Fly by Pointing your Index Finger in the Direction of Flight

â€¢Unrestricted menu interaction, every option is available

**Customizable Flight Controls**

â€¢Button Remapping

â€¢Comfort Settings

â€¢Flight Controls Range from Simple to Complex Cinematic Flying

**..out of space, check "earthquest.site" for all features..**

changelog.change_log:
v26.00 is OUT!! The Biggest Update Yet??

1. Introduced a seamlessly integrated Vignette (View Boundary to eliminate motion sickness) Comfort Feature!

1.2. Introduced a Hub Menu Selection Highlighter feature to show what and which settings are currently selected and in use.

1.3. Redesigned the Hub Menu Layout to allow the Vignette Feature and all Comfort Settings to be easily and intuitively customized efficiently.

2. The Street View Loading Screen is now Transparent! This allows viewing the 3D environment while waiting 1-2 seconds for each new panorama to load.

2.2. Street View Loading Screen is now High Resolution and has a different design!

3. Flight Boost Trigger Buttons are now Pressure Sensitive (More Pressure = More Boost) and can now be used at the same time to accumulate double boost!

4. AI now has a Sound Effect to notify the user when the Microphone starts recording your voice.

5. Updated Hub "EarthQuest" Title Model and Texture.

6. Renamed the "VR Background" Feature to "AR Background."

This is a BIG one! Please let me know ASAP if something doesn't work as expected. I tested everything as much as I could.

v25 is set, your best bet yet ðŸ˜† 

1.Thanks to the Meta Quest Support team, the Hand Tracking â€˜ required â€™ issue is now solved !!

2. The Controller â€˜Menuâ€™ button and Hand Tracking â€˜Pinch to open Menuâ€™ gesture are now both connected to the EarthQuest menu ! - Youâ€™ll now have an easier, more efficient & intuitive alternative way of Opening / Closing the Menu !

3. A more concise Hub Menu button layout ( multiplayer section )

3.2. Changed the Multiplayer Button in the Hub for choosing a Room Name from "Type Room Code" to "Type Room Name" to avoid confusion and for consistency

4. Fixed distance from sea level in meters *glitching out* when going over 9999999m

5. Modified the terrain allocated memory very slightly to potentially completely solve the ' out of memory ' system crash that's happening extremely rarely due to some OS inconsistency.

https://youtu.be/mpxN1LxR4KI

v24.53 is Out

**1.** Made a change to potentially fix the rare "Out of memory" crash that happened on Q3 when using max settings -** if it still happens, please let me know immediately** so i can make sure it's fully fixed in the next version.

**2.** Introduced the website ( ***earthquest.site***, ***faq.earthquest.site*** ) addresses in the hub, and rewritten a note to be shorter and more concise.

**3.** Rephrased a few notes in the API Setup

--

A Big **Terrain Visual** Upgrade that improves long distance rendering, and multiple **Performance** Improvements - v24.50 is Out !!

**1.** Introduced a Z-Buffer Management System, basically using the Camera Rendering distances ( minimum - maximum ) to their full potential to **maximize rendering accuracy** ( for distant terrain ) based on altitude, player scale, and other factors !!!

**So yes,** terrain flickering is now as low as it can **technically be achieved** with the current player scaling :D
Previously, the flickering effect was visible even when using the larger player scales, **now,** you'll notice that the flickering is **barely visible at small player scales** and greatly minimized on very distant landscapes. **In fact, the flickering COMPLETELY disappears after the player scale value of 150 !!**

**1.2.** Thanks to this system, computing performance is also improved due to the less **non-visible** data being rendered on occluded terrain ( like on the other side of Earth ) or very far terrain surfaces that were otherwise not present in the userâ€™s perspective.

**2.** AI Vision should now also be better thanks to improved AI image quality - so AI responses about visual location recognition should now be slightly improved !!!

**3.** Much, **much** Smoother Earth Scaling and Overall Visualization from High Altitudes !!

**4.** **Tons and tons** of code optimizations for computing performance !

A Big **Terrain Visual** Upgrade that improves long distance rendering, and multiple **Performance** Improvements - v24.50 is Out !!

**1.** Introduced a Z-Buffer Management System, basically using the Camera Rendering distances ( minimum - maximum ) to their full potential to **maximize rendering accuracy** ( for distant terrain ) based on altitude, player scale, and other factors !!!

**So yes,** terrain flickering is now as low as it can **technically be achieved** with the current player scaling :D
Previously, the flickering effect was visible even when using the larger player scales, **now,** you'll notice that the flickering is **barely visible at small player scales** and greatly minimized on very distant landscapes. **In fact, the flickering COMPLETELY disappears after the player scale value of 150 !!**

**1.2.** Thanks to this system, computing performance is also improved due to the less **non-visible** data being rendered on occluded terrain ( like on the other side of Earth ) or very far terrain surfaces that were otherwise not present in the userâ€™s perspective.

**2.** AI Vision should now also be better thanks to improved AI image quality - so AI responses about visual location recognition should now be slightly improved !!!

**3.** Much, **much** Smoother Earth Scaling and Overall Visualization from High Altitudes !!

**4.** **Tons and tons** of code optimizations for computing performance !

1. Huge Keyboard UPDATE, The keyboard is now equipped with :
- Numbers Through : 0 - 9
- Recenter Keyboard Button
- Recenter Countdown Timer ( 3, 2, 1 ) for easy control over keyboard position
- Written Note on the top right corner of the Keyboard ( for manual readjustment, in case the recenter button is somehow not reachable )

2. TWO Brand NEW Player Scale Levels :
- 1000 ( added over the previous scaling system )
- Human Size - Perfectly & accurately aligned with real life measurements !!!

3. A New Zoom-In Level for the Google Map Feature - Now able to spot tiny points of interest like supermarkets, hotels and other specific building names or even small valley names !!

4. FULLY Integrated Rotation Ability in the Hub ! This will be useful for looking over to the API Step-by-step Instructions, the beautiful Milky Way view, or back to the Video Tutorial 

5. Fixed AI Chat not visible in Street View ( Hand Tracking - Multiplayer )

6. Much more naturally balanced flight sound effects and wind volume.

+ MUCH MORE SMALL ADJUSTMENTS AND FIXES TO ENHANCE THE OVERALL EXPERIENCE !

**v23.00 IS OUT STRONG !!**

1. Street View Quality Enhancement
2. Street View Loading Screen Implementation
3. Public API should have more capacity starting today-tomorrow
4. AI Now reloads with 50 TOKENS every 5-6 hours !!

Bugfix Update !!

1. The Pointer at the top of each Controller could be seen floating around your head position when starting with Hand Tracking, this is now fixed.
2. Increasing Terrain Quality will NO LONGER Refresh Terrain if the Quality is already maximized.

v22.30 is OUT !!

**BIG** Update in many ways !! 

**1.** Fixed the Street View Portal having inconsistent sizes based on player scale, which could've lead to the panorama being uncomfortably close to your eyes. 
It is now a seamless comfortable experience for every scenario, also fixed multiplayer friends rendering inside your street view bubble when getting very close.

**2.** Each time you enter a multiplayer room you'll be exactly where you've been last time in Single Player starting v22.30, in the previous versions you started each time in space  (could have gotten annoying since your friend was starting there too, so you could've been one inside another :flushed: ) , so you or your friends have to use the "Teleport to Second Player" button if you are in different countries or cities and want to see each other at start.

**3.** Wind and Morning Sounds are now more naturally implemented with less noise, smooth looping, and more natural overall volume.

**4.** AI Vision is noticeably Better !! 
it now receives your surroundings with much larger resolution and much more overall quality, so in case you want to ask the AI about something visible near you, the chances of getting an accurate response is now exponentially higher.

**5.** The Speed Setting now has an extra level of slow speed, useful for high elevation terrain.

v22.20 is Out !!

**1.**  The Milky Way Galaxy is now 8 TIMES higher quality than how it was before ( __see vid below__ ) !!
**2.** Added 7 new colors for Avatar Styles :avatar: 
**3.** The moon is now slightly smaller ( more like real life ) , has a more realistic glow, and it's higher quality !!
**4.** THE MORNING "BLUR" IS NOW GONE !! The processing used for the morning light effects were implemented to render them at half the normal resolution, now everything is running at** MAXIMUM RESOLUTION**, **INCLUDING ALL THE OTHER LIGHTING EFFECTS !!!**
**5.** Reverted a very small color change in the Middle of Day Light inside of Immersive Sky Mode.  (less yellow) Thanks to @thunderella for the suggestion :heart_2_EQ: 
**6.** Fixed the empty space at the start of some AI Messages.
**7.** Fixed the music volume not going back to normal volume after a rare scenario where the AI Companion fulfills a teleportation request without providing a message.
